:::{#hero-heading}

I'm a [Genomic Sciences](https://www.lcg.unam.mx) undergraduate student at the [National Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM)](https://www.unam.mx) with a keen interest in computational biology and bioinformatics. In recent months I've been applying my knowledge to plant regulatory systems during development in _Arabidopsis thaliana_ and in algorithm benchmarking (memory and time consumption) and assesment (potential method biases) for structural and topological comparison of complex networks.

I enjoy Python and Julia coding, specially for analyzing omic data sets with aim of capturing biologically and statistically relevant patterns.
